fields.name: Raw
fields.description: Data in its original form without any processing or aggregation

fields.name: Aggregated
fields.description: Data aggregated according to certain criteria (for example, averages, totals)

fields.name: Anonymized
fields.description: Data from which personally identifiable information has been removed or masked to protect privacy

fields.name: Summarized
fields.description: Data presented in summarized form (e.g., pivot tables, graphs)
